title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Local Authorities (Traffic
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Local Authorities (Traffic 
Wardens) Act 1975 (Fixed Charge Offences) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited local authority (traffic wardens) act 1975 (fixed charge offences) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of February
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 1st day february

title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: 4. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of
text_raw:
4. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion of 

the following paragraph after paragraph (a): 

“(aa) €80, in respect of the offence under section 35 (5) of the Act of 
1994 for a contravention of the provision of the Regulations 
mentioned in Schedule 1A,”.
text_norm: 4 regulation 5 principal regulation amended insertion following paragraph paragraph (a) (aa) eur80 respect offence section 35 (5) act 1994 contravention provision regulation mentioned schedule 1a

title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by the insertion of the following
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by the insertion of the following 

Schedule after Schedule 1: 

“Regulation 5(aa) 

Schedule 1A 

€80 fixed charge 

Offence under Section 35(5) of the Road Traffic Act 1994 

Road Traffic (Traffic and Parking) Regulations 1997 (S.I . No. 182 of 1997) 

Article 

36(2)(i) 

Description of Offence 

Parking a vehicle on a footway, a grass margin or a 
median strip 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [748] 3 

36(2)(m) 

Parking a vehicle in a cycle track where traffic sign 
number RUS 009, RUS 058 or RUS 059 is provided 

39 

Parking a vehicle in a bus lane or on a bus only street”.

title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: 6. The Table in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to the Principal Regulations is
text_raw:
6. The Table in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to the Principal Regulations is 

amended - 

(a) 

in the column entitled “Article”, by the insertion of “other than 
paragraphs (2)(i) and (m)” after “36 (as amended by Article 7 of 
S.I. No. 274 of 1998)”, 

(b) 

in the column entitled “Article”, by the deletion of “39”, and 

(c) 

in the column entitled “Description of Offence”, by the deletion 
of “Contravention of prohibition on parking a vehicle in a bus 
lane/bus-only street”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [748]

title: on me by section 3 of the Local Authorities (Traffic Wardens) Act 1975 (No. 14
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations increase the fixed charge for parking on a footway, a cycle 
track, or a bus lane. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [748] 5
